website_summaries.verdict: Despite an adjustment period, these patented toe separators are hard to beat when it comes to the quality, comfort, and results they provide.
pros: Offers a soft, comfortable way to stretch toes and aid with a variety of foot problems
patented design by a top brand
cons: Though most users found them comfortable between the toes, they had to start out wearing them short periods of time at first

customer_reviews.title: MUCH smaller than their ad represents - and was send knock-offs.
customer_reviews.text: I have a size 10 foot, so that photo on their main page is either from a VERY small person, or a larger version of these that they not longer send out. It does close to nothing for me. LOOK at the other 1 star reviews that have pictures - someone the ones that I and other's receive are knock-offs - and are smaller. If you have tiny feet, go for it. If you are size 9 or up, other products will be superior to this, for sure. Buy at the risk of getting the fake ones.
customer_reviews.author: Asami

customer_reviews.title: Not Much Change
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Yoga Toes by Gems for about one month. I use them in the evenings before retiring for between 15 mins and two hours. They are easy to put on and easy to take off. They are soft and I experience no pain except for my little toes. The little toes are uncomfortable mostly because they need to be separated the most. I have not noticed much change in my toes nor have I noticed any other positive changes. I will continue to use Yoga toes and report any thing of interest.
customer_reviews.author: raj from chicagoTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Lack of functionality
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay put at all. You have to grip them with your toes to keep them on, which kind of defeats the purpose of trying to stretch out my toes. I would not suggest these. They are overpriced and underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia C.

customer_reviews.title: Buying these was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: you cant do anything but sit still. You cant wear them to bed because they get entangled in the sheets.They absolutely prohibit wearing shoes with them on. they make my feet feel like I'm walking with rocks between my toes if I try to cross the floor with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After two times of using it, seems like the material is not good because now it won’t stay on my toes. Don’t buy this product because it seems to stretch and fall off your toes after 1-2 times of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they did not work for me. I put them on and a couple minutes later, my toes hurt so much that I had to take them off. I found it very uncomfortable. The other problem is, when I moved my feet, the Gel stretcher got kind of "hung up" on the bed sheet. I will try the ones that are knitted.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: They stretch your toes so much it does something to one of your foot nerves like you are going to get a foot cramp and ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get these and they are sitting in my closet and not on my feet. They stretch your toes so much it does something to one of your foot nerves like you are going to get a foot cramp and if you leave it on it feels like your foot is sprained. Wish they would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I returned these. I wasn't able to get them ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. I wasn't able to get them between my toes. I turned to a more gentle toe divider. Maybe down the road when my foot situation improves I will try them again. Also, the product arrived damaged. One of the toe dividers was bent so far out of whack that I wouldn't have been able to use the product even it I had been able to get it between my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Spread 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Started wearing these yesterday while watching TV. My left foot has a bunion and a curled toe. My right big toe and second toe are both fused. I could only keep these on about 20 minutes, but my gait was stable all day and I had better balance in yoga tonight. Plus, no pain in my toes. It was nice to not think about my feet at all for a day. Definitely not something for long term wear, just keep them on while you chill, remove if you start to feel pain. No data on whether these will straighten my toe. Will keep wearing & revise my review after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feeling a stretch!
customer_reviews.text: The first couple times I used the Toe Gems, the stretch hurt so badly I couldn’t keep them on for longer than a minute at a time. I can tell that I’m experiencing some progress because they no longer hurt to wear for 5-10 minutes at a time. I’m a Womens size 8, with pretty narrow feet. I’m developing a bunion on my right foot, and just trying to take care of my feet to hopefully save myself from surgery down the road. I’ll use these for a couple months and keep you updated!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jackley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I’ve suffered with plantar fasciitis for nearly a year and have bought every cheap and expensive remedy on amazon for this along with going to doctors for injections, physical therapy, foot massage therapy, magnesium sprays, etc... in three days of putting these on I am now walking without heel n foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahuamom

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking the Yoga Gems would be a stiffer more plastic-type material from the photo, but they are actually made of a super comfy gel and were VERY easy to put on! I learned about stretching the toes in a yoga class a couple years ago and finally broke down and got these. Great decision! I work on my feet most of the week and get a lot of cramps, and my flats always squish my toes together. Hoping this will help get them back in line where they should be. Love my gems!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get the results i had hoped for....
customer_reviews.text: My second to last toes have begun to curve & I am getting a bunion on my right foot. I tried these YogaToes GEMS as directed, for a week, but unfortunately I did not see any visible results. However, I do believe that it helped stretch my foot and alleviated some foot fatigue I had been experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have. They help relieve stress from your feet after a long day or a long run. They help shape back your feet to their natural form. A lot of modern shoes are too narrow (width) and cause side effects that we might be unaware of. As an ultra-runner I use ther in conjunction with wide toe box shoes (like Altra) to keep my feet healthy. Having PF from time to time , the Yoga Toes Gems have helped relieve some of that tension. These are so good that I have gifted them to family members. They are somewhat pricey but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Lovin my new yoga toes!
customer_reviews.text: I already have an older pair of yoga toes. However, these looked a little quicker & easier to get on & off when in a hurry. I have been wearing yoga toes for a number of years mainly due to my moms feet. Yikes! Won’t be me. I have worked in professional offices & wore heels. My feet would kill me by the end of the week. I started using these, and my weekend foot pain went away and my toes are straight. Worked for me! My sis asked me why I don’t have bunions like she and the others do. I showed her. There is a comfort curve, but I think it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: YiPease

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been practicing Hatha yoga for several years and in the last year started getting cramps in my feet and then plantar fasciitis in my left foot. I’ve been adjusting my diet, stretching more, using support in my shoes, but then I noticed that I carry a lot of tension in my feet and hands during the day, at work, and even at night. These yoga toes help so much to stretch my feet, keep my toes in their natural position and relax my feet. The fasciitis is going away and I enjoy using the toes a couple of times a day. No cramping either.
customer_reviews.author: lightshow

customer_reviews.title: Too early to see full results but LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! Out of nowhere one of my toes was stiff and didn’t bend. I looked it up and realized I had a hammer toe. Started to look at some natural remedies for hammer toes and came across this product. Bought it. Love it! For my feet I’m able to use it for an hour one or two times a day. I didn’t have to work up to it but my hammer toe was just starting to stiffen up. The first time or two I put it on it was a little bit of a struggle. The material is soft. Flexible and fairly comfortable. I felt very minimal discomfort. I love the results!
customer_reviews.author: Jill L.

customer_reviews.title: Too Big and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This item was way too big, uncomfortable and unyielding, at least for my small feet and toes. I don’t know how anyone could use these with any comfort. I’ll stick with my pedicure separators.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Especially since they are open. Easy to put on. Going to send them a few friends! My whole family has these now🤗
customer_reviews.text: I was visiting my family & I bought them for my mother who is 82 & plays tennis 2 -3 times a week. She loves them. My brother, who has foot problems too & participates in ironman competition also ordered them & loves them...enemy my other brothers mother in law ordered them after she tried mine!! Great for all ages''''
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drug free pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: After the first use I could feel relief from the pain in my toes. The pain had been so bad it kept me up at night and my toes were so stiff I could not move them. Now after a week of use I have worked up to wearing the YogaToes for 35 minutes at a time and my toes move easily and I am able to rest. I do feel some improvement in my plantar fasciitis pain as well. I would recommend the Gems model to those with wide feet because I am able easily put them on. I am so glad I tried these!!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a specific reason- I have insomnia and anxiously clench/crack my joints when I am trying to fall asleep. I bought Yogatoes so I would be able to relax my feet and prohibit myself from tensing my toes. I got the product today and have tried it for a few minutes at a time, it is definitely uncomfortable right now (not terribly so) but I am really looking forward to the benefits as well as being able to wear them while I fall asleep!! It definitely makes me unable to crack my toes so I really hope this product will be a game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love these yoga toe gems
customer_reviews.text: I'm dealing with a tailor's bunion and the beginnings of big toe bunions. I'm doing exercises to mobilize the bones and muscles in my feet. These "gems" are really gems. I wear them at night while relaxing and or watching tv., usually 45 minutes or so. I love when I remove them and see my toes are separated and straight. They don't stay straight ( yet) but I'm experiencing a lot more flexibility and mobility in my toes and it's only been a few weeks. My physical therapist recommended I try these. I am very happy with them. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tangie Solow

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: These are far superior to the original yoga toes. I am able to separate my toes and get a really good stretch. With the originals my little toe would slid out. These enable any one's toes to be separated and fit into the toes holes. Follow directions and gradually increase time worn. I started with 10min. Up to at least an hour after 1 week. Must be consistent. Can not wear in shoes at all or walk very well. Tv relax time best. Dusted mine with foot powder. Makes easier to apply and keeps clean hygienic. Wear gel separators for day wear
customer_reviews.author: BarbiRN

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been suffering from plantar fasciitis for over a year and have added these to my regime for my foot to finally feel better. I bought a pair for my dad for ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for a while now daily. Admittedly when I started using, I thought they were some sort of old time torture device. Now I’m up to about 45 minutes at a time. I can def tell a difference after using. I’ve been suffering from plantar fasciitis for over a year and have added these to my regime for my foot to finally feel better. I bought a pair for my dad for a hammer toe hoping he can tolerate soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These things WORK!
customer_reviews.text: These Toe Gems really work if you give them a chance. They hurt a lot when you first start using them, but be patient. As they spread and stretch your foot, you'll find that your overall foot pain and discomfort diminishes, and I swear it helps with plantar fasciitis, and calf pain and cramping too. I have terrible bunions, but these things have helped push the big toe back in a somewhat more normal position, and have definitely helped with the overall flexibility of my entire foot and toes so that the bunion isn't painful.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present gone RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother who has pain in her toes and feet. It was a Christmas present as she is very hard to surprise and she loves them. She uses them every night because it’s made a difference for her. I tried them myself and for what the product actually is, just a firm gel, it actually is quite effective on relieving foot/toe pain. This isn’t a replacement for seeing a foot doctor, but it will sure improve certain conditions. I mean when’s the last time you thought about stretching your toes?!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend getting them
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can put them in the freezer. Simple to use. Just wet them and slide them in between your feet. It’s a bit uncomfortable at first, but it gives my feet a nice toe. I can barely make my toes spread apart and the more I distance run and she, the more my toes are starting to curl up and be extremely stiff. I wear a woman’s size 10. Fits my toesies just fine. Love that you can easily wash them after each use. Very hard to walk with them on but it does add an extra level of toe stretching when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Purn3l!$

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work when used consistently
customer_reviews.text: I bought these almost a year ago, but put off reviewing them because I wanted to give them enough time to actually work. I can say now that when I used them consistently for 30 minutes or more per day, they did help reduce pain a lot. Even if I went through a period of not using them as I should, they offered some relief. I was going to give them only 4 stars on comfort because they felt a little uncomfortable, but the more I used them, the more the discomfort disappeared. I won't say they're a miracle product, but they did help me when I used them consistently.
customer_reviews.author: A reader in Southborough

customer_reviews.title: It’s been a year...
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga toes sessions! They hurt a little at first, so short sessions to start was best for me. I worked my way up to forgetting they are even there and being sad when I had to get up from such a great restful position! They have helped so incredibly much with my precious knee pain, which barely bothers me anymore (thanks to this and my Birkenstock’s!). I can enjoy hiking with my kids again and building fairie houses!!!! Best $20 I ever spent on my #selfcare. #grateful #empathicmama
customer_reviews.author: Richard jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: They make my feet feel good after I'm done
customer_reviews.text: After a friend visited and had some of these, I had to get them! They make my feet feel good after I'm done. I've found it's important to pull them as close to the web in your toes as possible. Haven't had any foot cramps since I started using them (knock on wood).
customer_reviews.author: J.M

customer_reviews.title: i got authentic yoga toes made in USA, logo imprinted on bottom, patent number on side..
customer_reviews.text: i love them. i got womens size 6-11. they were a challenge to put on at first. my toes hug each other so it took some cussing i mean coaxing. all the more reason i need these! it says they are BPA free, HYPO allergenic and medical grade. once i got them in place i wore them for an hour without discomfort. i took a short walk in house to try them out w no problem. when i took them off, my feet already looked better. i am very happy w my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ms moose

customer_reviews.title: Made a difference
customer_reviews.text: These substantially helped decrease my foot pain and helped get better bone alignment for problems related to flat feet. It took some getting used to but I can now use them several hours a day if I want. After a very short time, I felt the muscles in the arch of my foot "turn back on." Not a cure all however. If you have other foot issues, you must examine the problem carefully, but these helped a lot. Coupled with some different mobility exercises and focusing on stiff Achilles, IT band and hip flexors my foot pain is maybe 15% what it was after only several weeks.....but it takes time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: honest opinion.
customer_reviews.text: i just got them i will update. after time. i feel like i should follow recommended advice. i do have multipul issues. trying them on first time there comfortable. I have diffrent issues. but i feel it. i feel the calf muscle strighting . i gave honest 3* for comfort and pain relief. its a good pain/comfort. better than tolerable. just want to be honest. i will add more posts and pics eventually. what i think when i have more time to feel one another out. thank you
customer_reviews.author: jenny pie

customer_reviews.title: They are also perfect to use when applying nail polish
customer_reviews.text: These definitely deliver! But I wish that the top and bottom part was thinner. I cant really sleep in these because the gel gets stuck to the sheets :( However I wear them when I can and they no longer hurt. My hammer toes are straightening up, YAY! They are also perfect to use when applying nail polish. If I could sleep in them and the top and bottom were not as thick it would get 5 stars. But a well made and hygienic product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Work as Advertised.  Fit perfectly fine for Men's 10B Shoe Size Wearer
customer_reviews.text: Bought on recommendation of massage therapist who works in coordination with bio-mechanic physician in the same office. My consistent shoe size, per Nordstroms and Red Wing Shoes, is Men's 10B. I've worn & loved Ecco's for years, but was just diagnosed w/bunions! I'm very athletic, but apparently, my posture and mechanics have been improper. First use of Yoga Toes resulted in immediate short-term pain in one bunion, but that dissipated completely after 5-10 minutes. My feet definitely feel better and I can feel the realignment slowly taking place in my toes.
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! I noticed the price and thought why
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I noticed the price and thought why? But I had tried jury-rigging for many months with only so-so results so I took the plunge. Oh my stars I look forward to wearing these! YogaToes are soft and shaped well - easy to walk around the house. They feel good while wearing them, but more importantly, they help me remember to stretch my toes throughout the day. All of this leads to the best part: my heels don't hurt all the time; sure in the morning or if I've been sitting for an extended time. But, I'm so grateful for some relief! These are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying for a bunion, your wasting your money and time. It does nothing. I use mine now to paint my toe nails.
customer_reviews.author: Thicks

customer_reviews.title: Really working!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for about an hour just about every day for a month now and they really seem to be working! You have to work up to an hour, or at least I did, and you can feel them stretching out your toes! I have a couple toes that are crooked and while they aren't 'cured' yet, I can tell how much more my toes are laying down flatter than they have in years. I am going to keep at it and see if this can save me surgery! Totally worth the money and effort to check these out and see if they help you!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Belue

customer_reviews.title: A literal GEM!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with plantar fasciitis pain for over a decade due to naturally flat feet. The pain was so excruciating that I had to change jobs. This is the first thing I’ve found that relieves my pain! 10 minutes of wear before bedtime does the trick. I’ve been pairing these with silicone arch pads and after just 4 days my feet feel better than they have in years.
customer_reviews.author: stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy stretch, but not intended for minor straightening
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking my new Toe Gem ritual - it's like a mini stretch at the end of the day & forces you to sit still for 30 minutes. I never felt any associated pains after 10-15 min of use. After a month, I haven't noticed any straightening effects. My toes are mostly straight already, but I'm going to continue to use Gems as a preventative measure and to encourage overall foot health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toe straightener!
customer_reviews.text: Love these YogaToes! I've been using YogaToes for almost 10 years to help ease some of the pain associated with my moderate/severe bunions, especially when I'm on my feet all day or wear heels. My first pair gave out after 10 years so I bought a new pair and I'm glad I did! They are easy to put on and help straighten toes. You can't walk in them and they don't stay put while you sleep but they are good to use while watching TV or just relaxing in bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Definite improvement
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of the original versions of these which you had to slip over your toes. They were difficult to get your toes through, never stayed on the pinkie toe and didn’t seem to help. The “gems” completely eliminate the first two issues and seem to be helping. I actually had a cramp in my outer calf come on while I was putting them on and it seemed to make it less painful and go away quicker. I think my toes even look a little less curled under. (People tell me to relax my toes, curled is relaxed for my feet) I’m happy I bought these and look forward to seeing, and feeling, even more improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with Claw toe a couple of years ago and told I needed surgery immediately. I did not want to rush into surgery so I used orthopedic insets to help. That helped for a while but lately I have noticed some pain in my toes and cramping. I tried a couple of other toe products and am trying these as the last resort. They do seem to be helping after just a few days of 20-40 minutes of use. They are a little hard to get on the first few times and are a little uncomfortable to start with, but that seems to be improving also
customer_reviews.author: James Richards

customer_reviews.title: great stretch
customer_reviews.text: These provide a great stretch.Had I known I would take to them so easily I would have just purchased the regular ones first. I noticed I could stand in heels longer after I used these. I don't wear heels often but it seemed like my foot could tolerate the heels longer. I can fall asleep with these on but I will fling them off in my sleep. I never remember doing so. It is intense at first but you get used to the feel of these quickly. Great stretch even up thru my ankles. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: I think that they are Helping!!!
customer_reviews.text: 56 year old man. I ended up with Hammer toe on the right foot after an injury last year. I have been wearing the YOGA TOE GEMS at night with a big pair of socks to keep them from falling off. My Hammer Toe seems a little straighter and I will keep using them. They do cause some discomfort after several hours and I have to take them off. Also they do rub the insides of the toes. All in All I am glad that I found them .
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: YOGA TOES
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these didn't help me at all. They are difficult to get on, and the hard gel pieces in-between the toes hurt entirely too much. I wanted to return them because I barely used them once but it's outside of the return window and now I'm stuck with them! I ended up ordering the toe socks that have sock material that goes in between my toes. I love them and they're much more comfortable. I am almost to the point where I can wear them overnight and they really seem to help my foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I needed these!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those little products in life that is everything you didn't know you wanted/needed. I keep these in my bedroom and after showering, I settle in for the night with a book or my Bible and wear these for a while. Relaxes my feet and toes and forces me to sit still for a while. At first, it was a bit uncomfortable, but over time, less so. You will be able to tell the difference after several uses. If I've had a particularly long day on my feet, I'll wear the Yoga Toes and prop my feet up above my heart a bit and it's a nice "reset".
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Relief from plantar fasciitis...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these (among other things) to try and help with plantar fasciitis and Achilles tendonitis. I really was not sure they would help, but I was ready to try any and everything. I got used to them very quickly and I can absolutely tell a difference in the morning if I did not wear them the night before. I put then in at the end of the day during tv time. They were softer than expected from the appearance of the photos, but firm enough that I think they will last quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lamarque

customer_reviews.title: pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually impressed by this product. I had some issues with heal pain and I do think it has helped. If anything, it feels good to stretch the toes. It's kind of uncomfortable at first, but as everything stretches it out it starts to feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kinzer

customer_reviews.title: Crooked RA toes are helped with this silicon device
customer_reviews.text: My RA seems to affect only the R side of my body so I can actually compare these two toe "correctors" on a misfigured foot and a normal foot. While I can never correct the deformation of my toes on the R side, I can clearly make them less painful by using the Yoga gems which stretch my toes after which my toes don't hurt. The left foot unaffected by RA just feels "better" after being stretched by the yoga gems. I wish there was something simmlar for my R wrist and shoulder!!
customer_reviews.author: Bodega

customer_reviews.title: I needed to exersice my toes
customer_reviews.text: When I had a pedicure, my toes couldn't be seperated to polish the nails. . They reccomended I get Yogo Toes. I did and I'm wearing them an hour a day. Although it is difficult to get my toes into the form it is helping to seperate them. I am happy to use them. I've had bunion surgery on my right foot, and I have a hammer toe on each foot. Wish I would have known about Yoga Toes sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nelson

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These are absolutely the best! I was unsure about them at first but they do what is claimed they do. I have fat feet and toes and a crooked 2nd toe on one of my feet. I also have poor circulation in one leg... I started wearing these at night and I can feel the blood flow in my legs and feet.. It took the swelling down in my toes and It also fixed my crooked toe!! I would most definitely recommend these for people with problem feet! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Newton

customer_reviews.title: 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 5 years now. I don't wear them everyday but I do put them on if my feet hurt or if I'm bored. I really like this product, its comfortable, feels good, easy to use. I have perfectly healthy feet, no bunions, hammer toe, ect... you can really feel the stretch after a while of wearing them. They make clipping and filing your nails easier. I really can't find anything bad to say about these. My feet feel great after using them.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Everything I thought it should be
customer_reviews.text: I do not have the most flexible toes but the soft gel material was very comfortable and easy to get on. I'm just starting to get used to them as I never used anything like this before. Hoping to have more flexible toes and space out the toes a little so they're not so crunched together. Overall very pleased and my mother just asked me to order her a pair. Don't have another product to compare it to but when you pick a winner you stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: JimG

customer_reviews.title: These YogaToes soothe my extremely tight bunion joint.
customer_reviews.text: These YogaToes soothe my extremely tight bunion joint. The doctor wants to do surgery, but as long as pain is low, I'd rather do what I can with my sports massage lady, mild exercises, YogaToes, and following her instructions. The combination means I can walk without injury 1.4 miles now. 4 months ago I couldn't manage 0.2 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento Pine

customer_reviews.title: Ah sweet foot relief
customer_reviews.text: Ah sweet foot relief! I hesitated to buy these at first because of the price, but they really do work to relieve my bunion pain. I took a few days to ease into the stretching by wearing them a little further toward the tips of my toes at first. Now it helps me to use a little baby powder to get them really into my feet for a full stretch. The longer I wear them in the evening, the better my feet feel in the morning. My family thought they were a little goofy at first, but they feel so goodI don't mind. I would buy them again and again. Yay for yoga toes!
customer_reviews.author: Squirlmama

customer_reviews.title: A Work-Out for My Toes!  Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: My toes don't separate on their own. I've been told to lace my finger between my toes to exercise them. It's very difficult to do that, and so I don't. But, with Yoga Toes, I can separate my toes and give them a little work out. I have to remember to flex my feet and rock them on the floor not just put on Yoga Toes and forget them. I really think Yoga Toes are helping especially with circulation. I'm glad I started with GEMS. I read that some people should start with GEMS and work up to the regular style. Very good advice.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn G

customer_reviews.title: Made my foot worse!
customer_reviews.text: Way to big and extremely uncomfortable. I’m a size 7 women’s. Made my foot problems worse! I put them away with the intentions of returning them. Forgot about them and now it’s probably to late to return. #justsayno
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but could use more big toe stretch
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I had another type where you had to stick your toes through holes, but this one since it's open on one end, it's much easier to put on. You can really feel the stretch. I also love the "gemstone" look. They remind me of ringpops--remember them? However, and maybe this is just my toes, there is not enough stretch between my big toe and second toe. So I actually wind up taking the outside piece and squishing that and the big toe piece together to get more of a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my YogaToes GEMS in the mail today and I am currently wearing them. The feel amazing. I have no pain or discomfort wearing them and I'll probably have these on for awhile! I recommend for anyone trying to bring strength, health, and wellness back into a body part that's commonly abused. My feet are women size 10, so I could see it being uncomfortable for some.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Foot issues improve
customer_reviews.text: Love these yoga toes gems. I have a “raging” case of plantar fasciitis, per doc, which unfortunately worsened following med advice! (boot and heel lift insert, and night splint created a bunionette and aggravated the PF). Well, these babies help! Started slowly, barely 10 min 1st time, and now can wear almost 1 hour. Wet them first for easy use. And relax while wearing them—they are not meant for walking! They do relieve pain from both PF and bunionette and seem to strengthen and realign toes, even if toes appeared ok before. These (along with iced water bottle, calf stretches and shoes with arch support) and finally, seeing PF improvemen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can feel my poor messed-up feet relax and the cramped pressure between all ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last week for my bunions and flat feet, and it really is so relaxing coming home and putting these on. I can feel my poor messed-up feet relax and the cramped pressure between all the toes diminish. I have a super narrow foot and it's difficult getting the last gems on my pinky toes, but no matter what - the feet feel great. Its also made me more aware of how I overpronate when I walk, and I'm working on changing it. They're easy to pack, so I'm definitely taking them on trips with me!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G

customer_reviews.title: Careful... watch out for numbness
customer_reviews.text: Product good for stretching out toes. However, it creates pain in that it overstretched toes and I started feeling numbness and tingling which I believe was nerve related. I am absolutely sure that if I continuedusing this item that I would have created permanent nerve damage. No longer using this. I am wearing flats and using the small toe separators that I get from pedicure session as a moderate option to improve my feet. Everyone is different. You may get better results but I am not endorsing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Women I would not buy, this is huge.
customer_reviews.text: These are way too big. I wear 8.5 in shoe and have small bones. I think it would be nice if they made a much more petite version. Barely stays on. Hopefully I can return it. Am an avid yogi who has both mortons neuroma and plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love my yogatoes
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the quick delivery. I have had pain in the ball of my foot with much of the pain coming from directly under my middle toe. I haven't had that foot pain since I started using this. I work out in the morning and as soon as I work out I put my yogatoes on, and set my feet on ice for 10 minutes. I am doing very well!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Buth

customer_reviews.title: You have to get your feet wet???!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had planned to use these while watching TV, but when I tried to put them on, they wouldn't slide on. So I resorted to the directions that tell you to get your feet wet before using these. Hello? How am I supposed to get my feet wet and then put these on and then -- somehow -- truck to my media room with wet feet and watch TV? I would return, but I used them. BIG WASTE OF MONEY. Read the instructions before buying these.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSatin

customer_reviews.title: These actually bring relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have very achy joints in my feet and after the first night of wearing them I had relief for two days. They are easy to put on and don't hurt between the toes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LadyAmazonP

customer_reviews.title: These feel amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these a few times and the feeling of separation is awesome. I probably don't need these as much as many other people (including my fiancee who says they hurt but are bearable). I feel like everyone with foot problems should use these! I don't need toe separators at the nail salon anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect!! Tried different things for plantar fasciitis and so far these are amazing!! I absolutely needed to ease into it- short periods of time. But dang- talk about pain relief!! And I feel it all the way up into my knees. I even have less lower back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Lecrouix

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Pain Management, Not Long Term Relief
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feeling of the Yoga Toes, however, they don’t really do much for me as far as pain relief. As soon as you take them off, you feel some relief, yet that feeling goes away quickly. I feel like this is just a short term temporary fix. Needless to say, they are a neat little gem though. I just think they are way too over priced. $15.00 sounds more feasible.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought the few months ago and was waiting to see results before I write out review. I wear them few times a week for 15 mins during the day and once a week I put them during the night all night. They relief the pain and keep my toes straight. Best product ever. I suggest it and for the people with no bunion issue as it can be used as prevention, especially for women who are used to wear high heels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper competitors don't work as well!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the rest. I've tried cheaper alternatives, including similar silicone toe separators, toe separator socks, but none of them work quite as well to give your toes that real stretch. YogaToes have a wider separation between each toe, so for someone like me with long toes, this does a much better job at stretching and relieving the ache from having your toes scrunched up in shoes all day. It's worth to spend a little extra for these!
customer_reviews.author: LA/NYC shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective!
customer_reviews.text: These overpriced gel toe separators do not work. Overstated marketing and advertising as to their ability to correct foot toe deformities!
customer_reviews.author: anne borella

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried the stretcher/separator it felt awkward for about 15 mts but then the gentle stretch relaxed my feet and my toes. I now use them daily whenever I am relaxing. It is a simple thing to relax my feet after a long day. I play tennis several times a week and I walk a lot so my feet can use relaxing and this does the trick. Thank you. Noelle
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the hype of this product. Doesn’t work and is painful!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Somehow they affected my shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: Bragging to every one this even helped my shoulders. I was in alot of pain in the ball joint and under all my toes. I wore them at night just a little while. Pain is gone. Shoulders are much better.
customer_reviews.author: jeannette

customer_reviews.title: They work !
customer_reviews.text: My feet tire easily because of circulation issues- so I wanted to try these. I was also hoping they would help with my oh so cute hammer toes. I just started using the yoga gems and I think these are great! Expect to have a little bit of discomfort when you use them. The pain is NOT unbearable and is due to stretching out muscles you don’t normally stretch. I would compare it to the good burning feeling you get when holding a stretch. After removing the spacers my toes feel awesome. And honestly- my feet looked better after the first use. More spaced out and relaxed. Who knew your feet could look so fatigued?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped alleviate pain of Hallux limitus. After a few days of wearing them a few hours at night, big toe pain has largely disappeared. A little uncomfortable to wear at first because these really stretch and space out your toes, but becomes more comfortable over time as your toes become more properly aligned, thus alleviating pain.
customer_reviews.author: dtcho100

customer_reviews.title: They help!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father who is 89th and extremely active - but has recently gotten badly crossed toes which cause him pain. He has just started using them - it seems to help with the pain - yet to see whether it will help stretch and straighten the toes back into "normal" position over the longer term. A little hard to put on between then smallest two toes - but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn B.

customer_reviews.title: The toe cramping was getting worse and occurred more often
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a week now and try to use them at least once a day for about 20 minutes. Sometimes I get in two sessions. I can see results already! I'm in my 70's and my feet have had years of neglect, with hammer toes on both feet plus bunions. The toe cramping was getting worse and occurred more often. When I saw these on Amazon and read other reviews, I decided to buy them. I'm glad I did and very glad to see the results I'm getting! It will be interesting to see my feet after a month or so. I would definitely recommend trying them...but you MUST use them to get results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough stretch/separation for big toes
customer_reviews.text: Wish these would stretch my big toes. Mine don’t move much, although the “gem” on the photo looks like it has thicker rubber for the big toe, it’s not thicker on the toe part, just the top gem. I bought these because I thought it would stretch my big toes more. But it doesn’t. The other toes are stretched and the gems are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable; I didn't find this relieved the pain very much, and research shows that they don't change anything in the long run. I bought because I wasn't expecting a fix but at least some pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: DMurph3

customer_reviews.title: excellent treatment for neuromas
customer_reviews.text: I've used YogaToes GEMS for four years now and can say that they keep neuromas at bay. Walking is no longer painful for me and my shoes fit fine again. The neuromas have receded, but they seem to return if I stop using the YogaToes regularly. Before that I'd had a cortisone shot, a more invasive and expensive treatment that didn't last long, and I was told surgery was the next step—now it isn't. About comfort: yes your toes will feel this at first, but with repeated use they gain flexibility, and they feel better after stretching. ps. Another purchaser recommended them for this purpose, and thought I should add my own recommendation by way of thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Pain Free
customer_reviews.text: A decade struggle with plantar fasciitis, hammertoe,neuroma,continual foot/toe numbness and back surgery, these true gems showed promise the first week! Painful at first but slow daily use shows remarkable relief of decades of pain I can now walk on the ball of my foot and even balance on one foot. Hours of PT accomplished little whereas this shows immediate results. Ridiculously $ for a blob of silicon but worth double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Offers Some Relief to Rheumatoid Arthitic Feet
customer_reviews.text: My wife suffers from a variety of maladies up to rheumatoid arthritis. A friend had told her about using these Get Toe Stretchers for her own feet. Since getting these my wife has said that after wearing them the appropriate and allotted time her feet feel much better. The remedy doesn't last a long time but even SOME relief is a good thing. We look forward to a hopeful long term remedy with these toe gems. Seeing and feeling how well she was with these, she also purchased the ones for the fingers and hands, the.
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Helps my bunions!
customer_reviews.text: Randomly came across these while searching for stuff for my bunions and decided to give these a try. Honestly I can tell a difference. After my toes have been jammed in my heels all day, it feels so amazing to put these gems in and relax. I do have a moderate bunion. I would like to see if these yoga toes will help it. I know my feet don’t ache as much since yoga toes. Like sometimes my feet would hurt just being under the sheets. But since wearing these, they don’t bother me in bed anymore. It’s definietly worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Say good bye to sore feet
customer_reviews.text: Keep your feet aligned with this product. I admit they are a little uncomfortable while wearing as they stretch the ligaments in your feet but I have found that I do not have sore feet by the end of the day anymore. I work on a concrete floor and on my feet all day. I wear good shoes but that was not enough. My massage person told me I need this product to align my feet so I bought them and they are easy to use and help my feet so much. Love this product for the help it has given me.
customer_reviews.author: sparky240voltTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are only size 5.5 so I was a little concerned if these would fit me ok but they did. I wear high heels a lot and had recently developed toe pain and noticed some changes to my toes. I read up on non-surgical ways to correct this and decided to give these a try. I love them! I eased into daily use starting with 15 minutes then increasing the time. They’ve become part of my nighttime routine and my feet feel so great after use. My toes are already looking better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Way too big to fit on foot. Way too big to fit in sock or shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO relaxing
customer_reviews.text: You won't even realize how tired and achey your feet are until you start using these! I used them a few times a week while watching TV at night and my feet have been feeling great. Especially if you wear constricting shoes, these are a lifesaver. Don't get a knockoff - these are higher quality!
customer_reviews.author: RazzleDazzle

customer_reviews.title: Great pair!
customer_reviews.text: Whew! These are cool looking and definitely will spread those toes! Leave them on too long too quick and they'll begin to feel uncomfortable. Definitely can't walk through the house barefoot with these because they'll stick to everything but overall great product. I have a couple different styles of toe spreaders/separators and these are good. I can see results after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Shinice

customer_reviews.title: Oh I do Love my Yoga Toe Gems
customer_reviews.text: Oh I do Love my Yoga Toe Gems. I use every day even when I went camping! Wore around the campfire! They are sticky to put on and read to wet them first but I definitely don't recommend to do that ( they won't stay on). I am up to a half hour or so now and my feet feel good and stretched. I don't have any serious feet issues and hope these will help to prevent. I'm 67 and my daily shoes consist of tennis and sandles. No heels!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Relieves foot cramps
customer_reviews.text: These really help a lot with foot cramps. I like them especially after a long flight. Put them on for 10-15 min and the painful cramps subside.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on the recommendation of my dance teacher. I'm not quite sure they do anything? I'm a size 8 and they fit snugly and stay put. They're easy to clean and easy to put on/use. I also don't have pain when wearing them...maybe a little discomfort once I get close to the hour mark? Meh.
customer_reviews.author: GinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but still easier/cheaper than surgery
customer_reviews.text: 3 years ago, a bunion started to form on my left foot. I managed a year of discomfort before I found yoga toes. In the two years of using through the night, I've seen the bunion go from a visible, large protruding bunion to a small insignificant bump on the side of my foot. Although many of the reviews and instructions say to use for an allotted time, I experienced more relief when I wear them for an extended period while sleeping. As many of the reviews say, they hurt at first but once my foot was accustomed to the deep stretch, it has become a relief to feel that stretch at the end of a long day
customer_reviews.author: ndnbtrfly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My bunions feel good in them. I can walk around in them barefoot (awkwardly). They relieve foot pain. I have big spaces between my toes, so there was no real adjustment period for me. My left pinky toe does get sore after wearing it sometimes, but I'm pretty sure that's just cuz my feet are dumb. If you have any trouble with bunions, hammertoes, bunionettes, or the like, they should be just what the doctor ordered...if the doctor ever bothered to actually help.
customer_reviews.author: ViaGoods

customer_reviews.title: Love These Little Foot Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapist and work with bodies and am on my feet for hours at a time. I put these babies on after a work day when I am planted on the couch and try keep them on for at least an hour. Immediately, I can feel tingling in my heels, in a nice way. After removing them, my steps feel more ground grounded and secure. Even my husband loves them and tries to steal them from me!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: #1 Product for those Bunions!!  Seriously
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LUV these!! I had surgery on my left foot 6 years ago for a bunion and the one on my right foot has only recently started causing me pain and burning sensations. This totally helps with that. I have seriously purchased everything in the bunion dept and this is by far the best tool. Wish I had found these before wasting all my money!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with arthritis in my toes and in the joints. These are by far the best toe separating and straightening product I have used. I am impressed by the quality of them. Start by wearing them for 10 minutes at a time. I can definitely tell in my toes afterwards that they have been stretched out and my toes feel so much better from this product. I wear a women’s size 11 and these were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Crislip

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Especially after trying the cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got weird shaped feet/bunions and I often get cramps from my pinky toe curling inward. I’ve bought so many versions of the cheap toe straighteners and have gone through them because they break easily. So I decided to finally try these and these guys are nice and sturdy but still squishy enough that they’re comfy. They’re pretty easy to clean and take a bit to get used to the fit. But I love the feeling of taking them off it’s kinda the same satisfaction you get when you take off heels at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

product_meta.title: YogaToes GEMS: Gel Toe Stretcher & Toe Separator - America’s Choice for Fighting Bunions, Hammer Toes, More!
feature_bullets: GEMS SIZING WOMEN: US Shoe Sizes 6-11 / MEN: US Shoe Sizes 7-10
Avoid Counterfeits! Buy Patented YogaToes GEMS Only from Seller Store “YogaToes”!
Doctor Recommended Toe Stretchers Straighten Toes & Increase Flexibility
QTY: ONE PAIR -- Made in USA from BPA-Free 100% Medical Grade Gel
Real & Honest Amazon Reviews. Read How GEMS Help Fight Bunions, Plantar Fasciitis & Many Other Foot Problems!
